Liz Holm's Research Group

  • Professor Elizabeth A. Holm
  • eaholm@andrew.cmu.edu
  • holmgroup

Liz Holm leads a computational research group focused on atomistic and mesoscale modeling and informatics in the CMU Materials Science and Engineering department.
